title: ARK Invest Sells Another $5M of Coinbase Shares; Buys Robinhood, SoFi
description: The sale of 38,668 COIN shares from the Ark Fintech Innovation ETF follows a similar offload on Monday.

title: Digital Asset Investments Soar in November, Spotlighting ETF Momentum: CCData’s November 2023 DAMR Report
description: CCData is an FCA-authorised benchmark administrator and a global leader in digital asset data, providing institutional-grade digital asset data and settlement indices. By aggregating and analyzing tick data from globally recognized exchanges and seamlessly integrating multiple datasets, CCData provides a comprehensive and granular overview of the market across trade, derivatives, order book, historical, social and blockchain […]

title: MDT plunged 40% shortly after reports praised its 7-day growth
description: A token for a decentralized data exchange ecosystem Measurable AI has lost over 40% in value just one day after reports praised its 117% surge on a weekly scale. Measurable Data Token (MDT), a native token for the Measurable ecosystem,…

title: BlackRock modifies proposed spot Bitcoin ETF to meet SEC requirements
description: BlackRock, the world’s largest asset manager, has recently updated its application for a spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) in a bid to address the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) concerns. The revisions, detailed in the meeting minutes from a…

title: What is Lightning Network and how it scales Bitcoin — a tech guide from Ruslan Tymofieiev
description: Recently, Ukrainian startup Stroom Network closed a Seed round and raised $3.5 million to develop and launch the “liquid steaking” of Bitcoin on the Lightning Network. This startup was one of the first investments by Boosty Venture Studio, part of the venture builder CLUST. The founder of venture builder CLUST Ruslan Tymofieiev told us about [...]
